data.name: ClickEdit
data.value: Modify the profile page of your workspace by clicking on the "edit" button at the bottom right corner of your workspace page. To help keep your page secure, the number of modifications is limited to 15 a day.

data.name: EncounterBugs
data.value: If you find a bug or have problems using the website, please do not hesitate to let us know by sending an email to support@eworky.com

data.name: FAQ
data.value: FAQ

data.name: FormForSearch
data.value: Use the search bar located on the homepage to easily search by location and type of workspace (WiFi hotspot, coworking space, etc.). Click on the “advanced search” button to refine your search, filtering by workspace type, need and name.

data.name: ForRateComment
data.value: To comment or rate a workplace, you must be logged in to your eWorky account. Once you are logged in, go to the workspace profile to comment and/or rate.

data.name: InviteFriends
data.value: How can I invite my friends to join the eWorky community ?

data.name: OnEWBuisnessCenter
data.value: On eWorky, a business center is a furnished offices building, that rents its individual offices for a limited period. The proposed rental agreements are more flexible and shorter than traditional rental agreements.

data.name: OnEWBuisnessHotel
data.value: On eWorky, a incubator is a place hosting young startups at a cheap rate and proposing some services. Startups are coached during their creation and developpement steps.

data.name: OnEWBuisnessLounge
data.value: On eWorky, a business lounge is a room with sofas and armchairs with a WiFi connexion.

data.name: OnEWConferenceRoom
data.value: On eWorky, a conference or seminar room is a room with a capacity superior to 20 people that can reach more than a thousand people. Ideal for conferences, cocktails, receptions, seminars, etc.

data.name: OnEWCoworking
data.value: On eWorky, a coworking place is a workspace where several independents, startups or nomads work. Openness, collaboration, accessibility, community, sustainability are core values of coworking.

data.name: OnEWDigitalPublicSpace
data.value: On eWorky, a digital public space is a non profit structure that offers WiFi access and that aims at teaching ICT.

data.name: OnEWOffice
data.value: On eWorky, an office is a closed room with one or more desks. "Office" refers to all offices with a flexible or mid-term contract, without any rental agreement, in a business center, a smart work center or an incubator.

data.name: OnEWorkyMeetingRoom
data.value: On eWorky, a meeting room is a room that can welcome at least two seating people. The proposed equipments (videoprojector, paperboard, microphone, etc.) are described in the "meeting room services and equipments" part.

data.name: OnEWPrivatePlace
data.value: On eWorky, a private place is a property or a room owned by a private individual that can be rented for different kinds of periods.

data.name: OnEWTelecenter
data.value: On eWorky, a smart work center is a workspace where teleworkers can use a desk, a WiFi connexion and sometimes more services. This kind of space can usually be rented for a period of one day.

data.name: OnEWVisioRoom
data.value: On eWorky, a visioconference room is a room offering all techical solutions to enable distance communication (audio or video) with one or more people.

data.name: OnEWTelework1
data.value: Telework is way to work using ICT outside your employers' offices.

data.name: OnEWTelework2
data.value: This way to organise work differently concerns all types of workers.

data.name: OnEWWorkStation
data.value: On eWorky, a desk corresponds to a furnished space of a few square meters. An open space usually groups several dozens of workspaces.

data.name: PasswordLost
data.value: If you forgot you password, {0} click here to receive a new password by email

data.name: ProposeWorkplaceAfterInscription
data.value: To be able to list of workspace or simply to join our community, you need to create an account. You account will allow you to list new spaces, and edit/review other workspaces.

data.value: How to report a bug?

data.name: SearchPage
data.value: Search page

data.name: SuggestWorkplace
data.value: The {0} tab enables you to propose a workspace to eWorkers. Only a few fields are mandatory to add your workpsace on eWorky, but we advise you to fill it as much as you can to facilitate information access to other users. Moreover, pictures are particularly obvious on workspaces profiles therefore we advise you to add at least 4 high quality pictures. To add pictures, please put your pictures on the field "Add pictures" or click on this same button and then choose the more appropriate principal picture.

data.name: TheInscription
data.value: Subscription

data.name: WorkplaceManager
data.value: You manage a business center or a smart work center and want to enable eWorkers to book your desks online? You can send us an email at contact@eworky.com

data.name: YouCanFindAll
data.value: Whether you're looking for business centers, hotels, cafes, smart work centers or offices buiding, whether you want to find, book, buy, rent, sell or share workspaces, eWorky will be there for you. You will find on eWorky the workspace you need, you will be able to comment your favorite workspace profile, to book it online, to add other workspaces or to find offices to rent or buy. By adapting to your new way of working, eWorky is for sure the best place to work!

data.name: YourPossiblilitiesOnForm
data.value: In the "Add a workplace" form, you will be able to choose pictures to illustrate your workplace description. To do so, you need to put your pictures on "+ add your pictures" or click on this button to choose your file, then click on Download to send it to us. The size of each picture should not exceed 3 Mo and you cannot add more than 10 pictures. Please make sure that you respect these limits and if the problem persists, you can contact us by email at support@eworky.com.

data.name: CouldNotEditLocation
data.value: I don't manage to edit a workplace profile.

data.name: ForEditProfil
data.value: You can access your profile from all pages of the website by clicking on the link "My profile" in the right top corner (you must be connected). To edit your profile, click on the link "Edit my profile" under your name on the left on your profile page. Complete it as much as possible to improve discussions quality between eWorkers and get some additionnal points.

data.name: HowEditLocation
data.value: The number of edits is limited to 15 a day. If you don't manage to edit workplaces anymore, please check that you did not go through the limit. If the problem persists, you can contact us by email at support@eworky.com.

data.name: HowEditProfil
data.value: How to edit my profile?

data.name: WhatAreThosePoint
data.value: What do the points on my profile mean?

data.name: WhatIsTeleWork
data.value: What is telecommuting?

data.name: WhyThereArePoint
data.value: By helping the eWorky community, you earn points that will allow you to participate in contests and receive discounts. You can earn points by adding, editing or commenting on workspaces, or by completing your profile.

data.name: Description
data.value: All answers to questions you're asking yourself on eWorky.

data.name: OnEWTeleRoom
data.value: On eWorky, a telepresence room is a room that gives to the participants of a videoconference the feeling that they are in the same room. It is equiped of cameras and micros, so that participants have real size persons around them.
